NAME: xorg-server
column3: is the graphical server. This first one may take a while as it pulls many other dependencies first on clean installs.

NAME: xorg-xset
column3: utility for configuring and ajusting X server

NAME: xorg-xprop
column3: is a tool for detecting window properties.

NAME: ffmpeg
column3: can record and splice video and audio on the command line.

NAME: mpc
column3: is a terminal interface for mpd.

NAME: man-db
column3: lets you read man pages of programs.

NAME: ncmpcpp
column3: a ncurses interface for music with multiple formats and a powerful tag editor.

NAME: arkenfox-user.js
column3: provides hardened security settings for Firefox and Librewolf to avoid Mozilla spyware and general web fingerprinting.

NAME: pipewire-pulse
column3: gives pipewire compatibility with PulseAudio programs.

NAME: maim
column3: can take quick screenshots at your request.

NAME: xclip
column3: allows for copying and pasting from the command line.

NAME: yt-dlp
column3: can download any YouTube video (or playlist or channel) when given the link.

NAME: simple-mtpfs
column3: enables the mounting of cell phones.

NAME: gimp
column3: is the GNU Image Manipulation Program

NAME: vim
column3: is a powerful terminal based text editor

NAME: anki-bin
column3: is a spaced repetition flashcard app
